HomeAbout

You and Rah stay back in the streets, blue light being cast on the moving people heading to the market. Most of the people are following the boat man, but a few are lingering behind like you and Rah. The boat sits still in the water, the last crate having been set on it, and being left presumably unattended.

A blue bolt whistles off of the boat just when you thought it was still. BANG! A brilliant blue spark splashes against the sky, glittering blue particles radianting off of the explosion.

Then it hits you. A wave of exhaustion comes over you and Rah, causing both of you to yawn. Suddenly your eyelids are heavy, and your legs are sore. You don't feel like being awake right now. You hear a snore and turn. Rah is lying on the ground, sleeping.

Let yourself restGo to that boatFigure out what's going onLeave Rah, you have to run!
